name: manor rush
description:
Welcome to Manor Rush this is my fist game as a submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2. sorry about the lack of assets but I hope you enjoy.

how to play:

while looking at the red circle press space to rewind it.

look at the monster for too long and it will run or charge at you.

wasd to move

you look at your mouse

find the key ( yellow square ) and get back to the door ( grey square )
